mapper.sql: t.id as id, t.name as name, t.image as image, t.price as price, t.store_address as storeAddress, t.create_time as createTime, t.update_time as updateTime, FROM_UNIXTIME(t.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as createTimeStr, FROM_UNIXTIME(t.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as updateTimeStr, t.create_user_id as createUserId
mapper.select:
SELECT , u.realname as realName, ifnull((select count(s.id) from t_afternoon_tea_select s where s.tea_id=t.id),0) as selectCount FROM t_afternoon_tea AS t left join t_user u on t.create_user_id = u.id where 1=1
and t.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
order by ${field} ${sort}
ORDER BY t.create_time DESC
